betterquesting:10.desc:8:
[quest]Large Solar Boiler[/quest]

During the day and with clear weather, the boiler will heat up at a rate of 0.1% per second. During the night and rain, the boiler will cool at a rate of 0.01% per second.

[warn]Adding water to a dry boiler with a heat above 50% will cause it to explode![/warn]

The boiler needs a clear view of the sky in order to generate heat.

The bronze variant of the boiler generates §a4800L/s§r of steam at full heat, while upgrading to the steel variant will generate §a14400L/s§r of steam at full heat.

After 24 hours, the boiler will begin to calcify. Max calcification will occur after 36 hours, and steam output will be reduced to §a33.33%§r. Calcification can be reset using the button in the GUI, and can be prevented by using distilled water.

§dQuest was written by TheBigCheesish
